en.name: Debate Club
en.passiveDescription: After using an Elemental Skill, on hit, Normal and Charged Attacks deal additional DMG equal to {{60//75//90//105//120%}} of ATK in a small AoE. Effect lasts 15s. DMG can only occur once every 3s.

zh.name: 以理服人
zh.passiveDescription: 施放元素战技后，普通攻击和重击命中时会在小范围内额外造成{{60//75//90//105//120%}}攻击力的伤害。该效果持续15秒，伤害每3秒只能触发一次。
